review_data.content:
Some price $$
Tan tan men is good but if you dont like ginger, take it out. It’s pretty strong.
Fried rice wasnt that bad but not amazing

Good food and great service!
You might need to book in advance cause the restaurant is quite busy.
The food is great and their vegan option are amazing! Great asian fusion restaurant!

I am a big fan of the Nooch@Aarbergergasse and I eat there every week or I use the Take-away service. The food is fresh and you have a broad choice of Asia food. The service personal is friendly and they try to fulfill you every wish. What I like most is the speed and readyness for Take-away. My favorite sushi: Tatar & Crunch!
Great place to eat. Good vibe. They could put less rice in the sushi... The starters are awesome! Nice looking card.
Amazing place! Really good service. Choice between sushi menu and warm dishes.
One of my favourite Asian restaurants in Bern. Food quality is really good, the variety is excellent and the place is well supported by fast working staff.

Great place for Asian and Asian Fusion food. Nice cozy and casual atmosphere, with friendly staff and fast service. Good vegetarian options. The main courses are a bit on the small side, so if you are hungry you may need an appetizer or desert. The desert were fantastic, specially the fried ice cream a nd the Asian influenced Tiramisu.

This Asian-fusion restaurant offers freshly made dishes from Japan, Thailand, Vietnam, and China. The atmosphere is casual. It's a great place for a quick lunch or dinner, but it can get crowded. In the summer, there is outdoor seating on the sidewalk. Nooch is part of a small Swiss chain of Asian-fusion restaurants.

We asked the waitress because we didn't understand well the price of each sushi roll on the menu, but she responded with a very unkind impression.  All three of us ordered the same menu, but one food came out about 15 minutes earlier and the other two came late, and the waitress came back to us to check the menu and return.  (At first, I could see that she didn't order the same 3 items properly.) The food tasted good, but it wasn't a happy lunch.

Even though we arrived pretty late before closing we still got the full and friendly service.

Amazing new menu with loads of delicious looking starters and meals to choose from.

Food quality is very good and prices are fair. Nice ambiente and outdoor seating in a secluded area.
Amazing food, great service...going more or less once a week

Great place to stop, catch your breath and have a meal while seeing the breath-taking sights in the capital of Switzerland, Bern. I had a great meal with chicken strips and aisan veg - very tasty. I'd love to come back and try their sushi.

All round good value for money. Efficient service catering to the customers needs. Authentic Asian and Far Eastern Cuisine. Popular with couples and mothers with babys. Very comfortable. Relaxed atmosphere. Can just pitch but safer to book.
Incredible. Lovely atmosphere and unique menu. Home-made dimsum was delicious. Mango, pomegranate, edemame and salmon poke bowl with black rice is my new favourite food combo!
Love this place the sushi is so fresh and tasty! The staff are also friendly. It’s a little on the expensive side but it’s Switzerland so... that’s to be expected :)
Decent asian fare with no fuss service and environment, green curry was awesome is really hot. Not for faint hearted
Nothing amazing but still ok if you wanna have a sushi bite or a noodle soup. Price middle range
Great food, very good service. A bit too expensive though.

A wide and delicious variety of sushi. Service is very friendly and orders are prepared quickly.

The spring rolls are another highlight although prepare your wallet for a negative surprise if you order them.
super delicious, excellent service and great ambient.

We had a very pleasant evening in the Nooch. The food was exceptional and the staff very friendly as well. Ambience and atmosphere were quite pleasant as well.
The menu clearly indicates vegetarian and vegan meals, which there is a good number of. Especially for an asian restaurant, we were positively surprised to have some vegan options.
Thanks :)
We ordered yesterday and the food is so delicious. Especially the nippon bridge is awesome, I only wish it contained some veggies. We will definetly order again!

Sushi Delivery
Miso soup was very good, but the Sushi was not nice. Balance is everything in Sushi. Too much rice, not enough fish, and the fish quality is not good enough (tastes bland).

Delivery time was very good, but i wouldn’t order Sushi again.

It was a nice surprise to eat authentic japanese Food.The Service for Take-Away is very good,because you go inside make the Order on a touch Panel what is very easy to handle,after that you wait 10 -15 minutes outside because actually with corona rules only 5 people Max can go inside.At the end you enjoy your food.thank you

Is quite expensive and the quality of the food is medium. I will very likely not go again. I ordered noodles with shrimps. I had 4 small shrimps in the plate and the noodles were mostly salty (soya souce taste). Maybe the cooker was not in the mood to cook.

Pretty good food. The service was a little bit slow but then picked up the speed and was VERY kind and helpful from the Start.
Me and my friend had the sushi. As i said it was pretty good but was lacking a certain something to make it outstanding.
Food was awesome but your waitress could be a bit (a lot) more friendly. No smile, at the limit of being cordial. No disrespect or anything just didn’t seem friendly at all.

My dish was okay, my husbands dish was alot better. I had a sweet and sour chicken dish and my husband had a chicken curry dish. Mine said it came with pineapples and there was literally one pineapple in it. I will try the sushi next time.

You want good sushi? Don't go here. You want a nice asian noodle soup? Don't go here. The noodle soup is bland. The sushi does not taste fresh. The rice underneath the fish is falling apart. Overpriced.
Extremely busy, you'll probably need reservations to be seated at lunch.

Im picking up takeaway food at nooch for almost about a year now.
The food quality is inconsistent. Sometimes its delicious as it should be but sometimes the sushi smells bad or there are other flaws. Since im paying always the same amount i expect the service to be the same quality aswell.

We ordered teriyaki salmon and chicken curry noodles. Both were like warm and quite bland in tasting. The waitress was friendly but pushing for additional orders which is annoying. The restrooms are not clean. We will not come back.
Easiest 5 stars I ever had to give
Delicious sushi and house-made ice tea and very friendly staff.

Up-spaced Asian-fusion kitchen, reasonable priced, easy uncomplicated.
Always worth a visit!
Bonus: if you happen to be there on the weekends, you end up in the amusement-park of the city where everyone's getting drunk.
Eating first, entertainment afterwards, perfect.

Was a very nice place, very friendly personal and the service is very fast. It is a little expensive though for a student, but it is definitely worth it. You can pay cash and with card, but I don't know if they accept twint.
Most delicious sushi in Switzerland 😋😋

Warning to Americans ....
I was a first time customer and ordered a Pho delivered. (I live a half mile away) The portion size is tiny for a lot of money and the food quality is low. It got to my house cold and soaked because the broth leaked from the cup.

Here is the specific run down so the restaurant understands the expectation:

1) I'm not quite sure the noodles were rice noodles ... def not transparent
2) The broth was more Ramen and not Pho. I added my own fish sauce to get it close. No citrus (no lime, lemongrass, ...). No star anise flavor.
3) The veg was standard (baby bokchoy)
4) The meat was terrible. (see below)
5) The delivery was cold and messy
6) The presentation ... this is why I am writing this review.  Nooch, please learn how to present a Pho. For delivery it comes in a HOT (broth) container and a COLD container (everything else). The meat is sliced and RAW so that it cooks in the hot broth. Your supposed to give me thai basil, cilantro, a lime, and chili paste as condiments (COLD).

That didn't happen ... I got 2 HOT containers, the sprouts were steeping in the hot broth and the basil was all mushy with the noodles and meat, the meat was precooked and totally dried out. None of this is enough of an issue for my to write a review but this misadventure cost me 34CHF ... that's right ... almost 35 USD for a half portion of PHO that was cold and horrible ... like I said "Warning to Americans ... this is not what your are expecting".

Sushi - 3.5 out of 5- 30 Chf, not so big portion
Ramen - 1 out of 5 - 23 CHF, far from authentic ramen, the fried tofu tasted rancid, noodle was too soft for ramen, the soup was NOT made out of any kind of bones for sure, it they want to charge 23 CHF, either soup or noodle has to be right.
Yakitori- 2  out of 5, 13 chf, they steamed the chicken & put some color on. The taste was very off.
Matcha Tiramisu - 3 out of 5, 13 CHF, a very small portion, does not look like the photo on the menu.

We wanted to have lunch today at nooch. we were 3 people and the place was far from full, actually pretty empty, the waiter forced us to sit at 4 persons table where another person was sitting, even though we told him we want to sit some place esle where would be more room rather than sitting there to disturb the other person. we had no chance to comunicate. as we moved a bit the table to make some space for us to sit he start complaining of how we would block the entrance door with our stuff. we stand up and went straight to the other place just 50 meters further where we actually had an amazing lunch. i think what this employ did was very disrespectful and we were very disappointed  i‘ve been more times before to nooch. from today on, never again!
Fast and friendly delivery. Well packed food, good presentation and tasty food. Will order again!
Perfect Asian food. Very tasty.
Great Concept, Tasty Food, But Alas  Shamefully Poor Service. Waiting staff did not seem to be at all interested, forgot to bring drinks, was difficult to pay the bill.
These udon noodles were good
Avoid! Unfresh supermarket sushis for an overrated price. Never again! 12 hours after, we still have sour stomach.
It is an average fast food, portions are huge, but also pricey and the taste is terrible. Otherwise, nice friendly staff, but we were only there once... I don't intend to go again.
For me, it's the best sushi located in Bern. Always a lot of different sushis and bunch of vegi options. They change the sushi menu depending on the season.
Very good food, and many options for vegetarians (myself being a vegetarian). Very fast service during the lunch time. Polite and english speaking staff. Overall very good.
Really nice food , not ovely expensive, english menus available. Comfortable , gets quite busy so worth booking a table in advance.
Very delicious and A1-ayce menu.
Food is good as always at nooch, but prices in the city are much higher than at the restaurant at the Shoppyland. Can't help to feel a bit ripped off.
Girlfriend says sushi is amazing. I have Thai but no matter what i order its always the same (but delicious)
I really LOVE the Foods, taste superrrr good and lots of choices. I really like the delivery service, so when I have to work long I can order Nooch.
Friendly staff but the Pad Thai we ordered not as tasty as in other similar restaurants  in Bern.
Nice place. Good quality of sushi although makis are oversized.  Low quality of the chicken in the chicken curry. Otherwise good.
Gyoza was too much dried but ok. Sushi and the rest was decent and ok. Good for a quick bite.
The second best sushi place in Bern. Not too bad, not too impressive either. I find it to be a middle range quality.
Not sure where the 5 stars come from...flavourless  "pad thai", poor service and overpriced meals!
Everything was so nice and the staff was very hearty. Only little complaint is the high prices, but its in relation for the quality.

Good lookin‘ but the quality… 🍣
Also to work there ist really though 🚲
Decent stir fry, the salmon summer roll was sub par though. The salmon was too dry.
Nice place, friendly staff, reasonable prices and very good food. Recomended
Every time i visit for lunch or dinner never disappointed specially having veg food.!! Penang curry.. green curry...its a delight..
Busy at meals time, tasty food, trendy clients, friendly service. Go once, you'll go again.
Tasty sushi!!
Best sushi in town
The locale feels cramped and tatty, despite the modern look. decent food, but quite expensive.
Good food,  sometimes overly crowded. Needs more vegan options.
Best sushi in town but Swiss prices
Good food, nice people and a very good value! Enjoy!
Quality of food is not good at all and prices are very high...delution!!!!!!
Amazing food, very easy to combine, try out new things and share together.
I really liked it! Nice place, fast service, high quality and fair price.
Best sushi I've had in Bern and probably Switzerland.
Nice food, not to expensive. Quiet in the middle of the day
Extensive choice of Asian foods. Great service!
Good sushi and really good home made ice tea !
Top
Fast service, good food. Recommended for lunch.
NICE..
Delicous food but very crowded and service varies
They are ok, just too ricey
It was a surprise, fresh and good food.
Extra
Super Service - Klasse Take Away - love it!
Legit sushi place, fresh fish
Nice food
perfect service, perfect food

(Translated by Google) Good food and friendly service. Unfortunately, the menu has been reduced, which has led to the tragic exclusion of two of my favorite dishes. We found the seating quite cramped, especially in these Corona times, the neighbors could eat on the left and right of the plate without any problems... next time again via bike courier delivery service.

(Original)
Gutes Essen und freundlicher Service. Leider wurde die Speisekarte verkleinert was zum tragischen Ausschluss von zwei meiner Lieblingsgerichte geführt hat. Die Bestuhlung fanden wir ziemlich beengt, vor allem in diesen Corona-Zeiten, ohne Probleme könnte vom Nachbarn links und rechts vom Teller gegessen werden… das nächste mal wieder via Velokurier Lieferdienst.

(Translated by Google) You can only find such delicious Asian food in Asia itself. It is very comfortably furnished and the selection of dishes is huge. You absolutely have to stop by there.

(Original)
So leckeres Asiatisches Essen gibt es sonst nur in Asien selber. Es ist sehr gemütlich eingerichtet und die Auswahl an Speisen ist riesig. Da muss man unbedingt vorbei schauen.

(Translated by Google) Very tasty food. I think it's great that there is a vegetable version of chicken.
Was full on Saturday night. It's worth making a reservation.
The service could have been more attentive.
The food and drinks were there pretty quickly.

Tip: splashed plum wine

(Original)
Sehr leckeres Essen. Findes total super, dass es eine pflanzliche Pouletversion gibt.
War am Samstagabend voll. Reservieren lohnt sich.
Der Service hätte aufmerksamer sein können.
Das Essen und die Getränke waren aber ziemlich schnell da.

Tip: Gespritzter Pflaumenwein

(Translated by Google) The food (sushi) is not of great quality, but it is good when you are hungry. Three stars. A fourth won the soup with vegetables and boiled egg, which had a good aroma and flavor.

(Original)
La comida (sushi) no es de gran calidad, pero es buena cuando tienes hambre. Tres estrellas.  Una cuarta se ganó la sopa con verduras y huevo cocido, que tenía un aroma y sabor bueno.

(Translated by Google) As an individual you get treated pretty lousy. First of all you can't reserve - no joke. Reservations are only possible for two or more people. And secondly, you are only offered one seat at the bar at a time, even if there are free tables.

(Original)
Als Einzelperson wird man ziemlich lausig behandelt. Erstens kann man nicht reservieren - kein Witz. Reservationen sind nur für zwei und mehr Personen möglich. Und zweitens wird einem jeweils nur ein Platz an der Bar angeboten, selbst wenn es freie Tische hat.

(Translated by Google) The service staff was super friendly despite the full house, and the food was on the table within a few minutes. Tasted great.

(Original)
Das Servicepersonal war trotz full house superfreundlich, das Essen innert wenigen Minuten auf dem Tisch. Hat super geschmeckt.

(Translated by Google) Very fine, even for those who don't like sushi, large selection, friendly staff

(Original)
Sehr fein, auch für solche denen Sushi nicht schmeckt, grosse Auswahl,freundliches Personal

(Translated by Google) Hello family, today I went to eat at Nooch. The food was 1A +! The curry was amazing (true Tamil who sat next to me tried it and said he would eat it every day) The food was quick at the table and the choice of food was huge (everyone can find something)

Passionate sushi eater Anja thinks: It was perfect for you, the prices are acceptable, the surroundings are pleasant and the sushi was one of the best she's ever eaten.

Ps: The staff is very decent and relaxed.

Your Local Humpty Dumpty 🥚🥚🥚

#HumptyDumptyInBern
#HumptyDumptyInNooch
#HumptyDumptyInHeart

Hallo Familie, heute war ich im Nooch essen. Das Essen war 1A+ ! Das Curry ist hammer gewesen (Wahrer Tamil der neben mir gesessen ist hat probiert und gesagt er würde es jeden Tag essen)Das Essen war schnell am Tisch und die Essens-auswahl riiisig(jeder findet was)

Leidenschaftliche Sushi Esserin Anja findet: Für Sie war es perfekt, die Preise sind akzeptabel, die Umgebung ist angenehm und das Sushi war eines der besten die sie jeh gegessen habe.

Ps: Das Personal ist sehr Anständig und gelassen.

Euer Local Humpty Dumpty 🥚🥚🥚

#HumptyDumptyInNooch

(Translated by Google) I love the Nooch, for me the best sushi bar in Bern, they have very tasty & fresh sushi.
The starters are also very, very tasty.
The iced tea from Nootch is a must to try, very tasty.
The prices are good and fair or the price-performance ratio is very good.
The service is very, very friendly.

(Original)
Ich Liebe das Nooch, für mich die beste Sushi Bar in Bern, dort gibts es sehr leckeres & frisches Sushi.
Die vorspeisen sind auch sehr sehr lecker.
Der Eistee von Nootch ist ein muss zum probieren, sehr lecker.
Die Preise sind gut und Fair bzw das Preis Leistungsverhältnis ist sehr gut.
Die Bedienung ist sehr sehr freundlich.

(Translated by Google) Only to recommend.
The staff are very nice and accommodating, the sushi tastes great, as do the other dishes on the menu. Everything is super fresh and was brought to the table hot or the sushi at exactly the right temperature without a long wait.
Reserving a table is highly recommended as it is not a very large restaurant

(Original)
Nur zu empfehlen.
Mitarbeiter sind sehr nett und zuvorkommend das sushi schmeckt super sowie auch die anderen Speisen auf der Karte. Alles ist super frisch und wurde auch heiss bzw das Sushi genau in der richtigen Temperatur an den Tisch gebracht ohne lange Wartezeit.
Tisch reservieren ist sehr zu empfehlen da es sich um kein all zu grosses Lokal handelt

(Translated by Google) The food was very tasty, unfortunately we had to wait a bit long at the beginning before we could order something to drink. Service otherwise good & friendly. Value for money.

(Original)
Essen war sehr lecker, leider am Anfang ein bisschen lange gewartet bis wir etwas zu trinken bestellen konnten. Service sonst gut & freundlich. Preis-Leistung stimmt.

(Translated by Google) A good location for sushi lovers. The map was digitized, which is a bit more complex for me. Individual dishes are great and I support this idea. Only with sushi as a single combination is scrolling extremely tedious and expandable. With the map as paper, it was more practical. Possibly activate the individual combinations as an order via the app so that the customer can order the quantity right away and the service staff would see it in the kitchen. Service staff nice, courteous and fast. The payment can be made at the seat (QR code also contains the total amount of the bill) and it can be settled with TWINT. Find the idea super innovative. You can walk by spontaneously, but it is recommended to make a reservation first if you want to stay longer in the Nooch.

(Original)
Ein guter Standort für Sushi Liebhaber. Die Karte wurde digitalisiert, der für mich selbst bisschen aufwändiger ist. Einzelgerichte super und unterstütze ich mit dieser Idee. Einzig bei Sushi als Einzelkombination ist das scrollen extrem mühsam und ausbaufähig. Mit der Karte als Papier war es praktischer. Evtl. via App die Einzelkombinationen als Bestellung freischalten, damit der Kunde gleich die Menge bestellen kann und das Service Personal würde es in der Küche sehen. Service Personal nett, zuvorkommend und schnell. Die Zahlung kann am Platz getätigt werden (QR Code enthaltet auch der Gesamtbetrag der Rechnung) und mit TWINT kann es beglichen werden. Finde die Idee super innovativ. Spontan vorbei gehen geht, aber es wird empfohlen doch vorerst zu reservieren, wenn man doch länger im Nooch verweilen möchte.

(Translated by Google) Staff very nice, food excellent and soo good! Portions have gotten smaller and smaller in recent years with prices rising, which is a shame! Loud and cramped when full. Hence 1 star deduction. Otherwise I really like being there!

(Original)
Personal sehr nett, Essen ausgezeichnet und soo gut! Portionen haben sich in den letzten Jahren aber bei eher steigenden Preisen immer mehr verkleinert, das ist schade! Laut und eng, wenn es voll ist. Daher je 1 Stern abzug. Sonst bin ich aber sehr gern dort!

(Translated by Google) The Nooch is a special place with its delicious Asian crossover on the plate and a relaxed atmosphere that invites you to linger.
We experience again and again (1x month) a fantastic evening with excellent service - Jann thank you very much, you are a valuable employee at Restaurant Nooch am Viktoriaplatz!
We are always very happy to be served by you!!
Many thanks - see you soon!

(Original)
Das Nooch ist ein besonderer Ort mit seinem leckeren asiatischem Crossover auf dem Teller und einer entschleunigten Atmosphäre, die zum Verweilen einlädt.
Wir erleben immer wieder (1x Monat) einen fantastischen Abend mit hervorragendem Service - Jann vielen Dank, du bist ein wertvoller Mitarbeiter im Restaurant Nooch am Viktoriaplatz!
Wir lassen uns immer wieder sehr gerne von dir Bedienen!!
Herzlichen Dank - See you soon!

(Translated by Google) My first choice in Bern🍣🍱 On site as well as takeaway a pure pleasure and always a highlight✨
Monday = All you can eat = ♥ ️🙌🏼

(Original)
Meine erste Wahl in Bern🍣🍱 Vor Ort wie auch Takeaway ein purer Genuss und immer wieder ein Highlight✨
Montag = All you can eat = ♥️🙌🏼

(Translated by Google) Were eating at Nooch in Bern yesterday.
It was delicious. We'll be back.

(Original)
Waren gestern im Nooch in Bern essen.
War super lecker.Wir kommen wieder .🥰🥰🥰

(Translated by Google) The sushi has improved a lot! The rice is soft and the fish is fresh. The sushi used to be inedible. I also like the decoration better. It is advisable to book a reservation in advance for Friday and Saturday evening.

(Original)
Das Sushi hat sich sehr verbessert! Der Reis ist weich und der Fisch frisch. Das Sushi war früher ungeniessbar. Die Dekoration gefällt mir auch besser. Es empfiehlt sich für Freitag und Samstag Abend vorab eine Reservation zu buchen.

(Translated by Google) If someone likes to be alive ... this is the place to be. Actually, I am in doubt whether 3 or 4 stars should be given, so between good and everything ok. First of all for dinner. Finally not same same but different (not blue as on the Staff T-Shirt) ... the roles are very fine and above all different. In other places in Europe you quickly get the feeling that Japanese people switch between only 5 dishes ... all year round ... that is not true at all from experience. You get more at Nooch. And at a fair price. Only with this success it would be good if the take away and home delivery were outsourced. It has two kitchens anyway. Then you don't have to choose between a draft and a back chamber. But those who like life or like to discuss aloud in a group can still enjoy it here. Plus the very quick, friendly and friendly staff ... I like it here, I'll be back.

(Original)
Wenn es jemand gerne lebendig hat... hier ist man richtig. Eigentlich bin ich im Zweifel ob 3 oder 4 Sterne geben sollte, also zwischen gut und alles ok. Zuerst einmal zum Essen. Endlich einmal nicht same same but different (not blue wie auf dem Staff T-Shirt)... die Rollen sind sehr fein und vor allem anders. In anderen Lokalen in Europa hat man schnell das Gefühl, Japaner wechseln zwischen nur 5 Speisen... das ganze Jahr... das stimmt aus Erfahrung ganz und gar nicht. Im Nooch bekommt man das Mehr. Und dies zu einem fairen Preis. Nur wäre es bei diesem Erfolg wohl gut wenn das Take Away und Home Delivery ausgelagert würde. Es hat ja eh 2 Küchen. Dann muss man nicht zwischen Durchzug und Hinterkammer wählen. Aber eben, wer gerne Leben hat oder selber gerne laut in der Gruppe diskutiert, geniesst dies hier trotzdem. Und dazu noch das sehr schnelle, freundlich und aufgestellte Personal... es gefällt hier, ich komme wieder.

(Translated by Google) The food is delicious and always there very quickly. There is something for everyone from sushi to dumpling to curry, noodles or rice dishes. In addition, the service is super friendly and attentive! ❤️ always happy! 🤩

(Original)
Das Essen ist meeega lecker und auch immer sehr schnell da. Es ist für jeden was dabei von Sushi über Dumpling bis hin zu Curry, Nudeln oder Reisgerichte. Ausserdem ist die Bedienung super freundlich und aufmerksam! ❤️ immer wieder gerne! 🤩

(Translated by Google) Very tasty, creative sushi and fusion specialties in a modern ambience in a central location. The service is courteous and efficient. Always worth a visit! The delivery service is also recommended.

(Original)
Sehr leckere, kreative Sushi und Fusion Spezialitäten in modernem Ambiente an zentraler Lage. Der Service ist zuvorkommend und speditiv. Immer wieder ein Besuch wert! Auch der Lieferdienst ist empfehlenswert.

(Translated by Google) A great restaurant. No matter whether you order sushi, noodle soups or rice dishes. The food is freshly prepared and tastes great. Nothing else was to be expected from Nooch & Negishi. The service staff is highly motivated and very friendly. This also applies to the delivery service. We have often ordered from Ostermundingen and the food always arrived on time. Even during lunchtime.

(Original)
Ein tolles Restaurant.  Egal ob man Sushi, Noodlesoups oder Reisgerichte bestellt. Das Essen wird frisch zubereitet und schmeckt hervorragend. War auch nichts anders zu erwarten von Nooch & Negishi. Das Service-Personal ist top motiviert und sehr freundlich. Das gilt auch die Lieferdienst. Wir haben öfters mal von Ostermundingen bestellt und das Essen kam immer pünktlich an. Auch während der Mittagszeit.

(Translated by Google) The different sushi variations are very tasty. However, the quality fluctuates very strongly. One time top, the other time a flop.

(Original)
Die verschiedenen Sushi Variationen sind sehr lecker. Allerdings ist die Qualität sehr stark schwankend. Einmal top, das andere Mal Flop.

(Translated by Google) Friendly and quick service. The sushi was excellent. We hadn't reserved a seat and could still consume something.

(Original)
Freundliche und schnelle Bedienung. Das Sushi war ausgezeichnet. Wir hatten kein Platz reserviert und konnten trotzdem etwas konsumieren.

(Translated by Google) The food was very tasty and you are served quickly. Super friendly.

(Original)
Das Essen war sehr lecker und man wird schnell bedient. Super freundlich.

(Translated by Google) great Sushi, but the young gentleman waffles everything .... przesympatyczny and very well done his work.
For over a year (we have been very poorly treated by a young, tight waitress) I dare to come back again and it was great :)
Sometimes I have the impression that there are too many students there and too few profesionalists

(Original)
super Sushi ale młody pan kelner przebil wszystko.... przesympatyczny i bardzo dobrze wykonal swoja prace.
Od ponad roku (zostalismy bardzo zle potrakrowani przez mloda beszczelne kelnerke) odwazylam sie wrocic ponownie i bylo swietnie :)
Czasami mam wrazenie ,ze za duzo tam studentow a za malo profesionalistow

(Translated by Google) Very popular in Bern. We often come over. Staff incredibly friendly and outgoing. Remains calm even in stressed situations. Very good sashimi, good noodles. Reservation recommended in the evening, v.a. Thursdays.
